metadata.title: Dickies Big Boys' Denim Bib Overall
features: SUPERIOR COMFORT FIT: These durable, 100% cotton denim overalls feature a generous, roomy fit with cross-over high back style shoulder straps for easy in & out, a bib pocket with pencil & watch compartments & a dual tool pocket for convenient storage

STURDY FUNCTIONALITY: These rugged & durable machine washable kids' overalls are built for play & equipped for comfort & convenience with a zipper fly, 2 compartment bib pocket and traditional carpenter styling including a hammer loop & dual tool pocket

TOUGH & ROOMY: Want a comfortable & extra-tough alternative to traditional belted work pants? Try our bib overalls in durable cotton duck or finely woven cotton denim. Both resist snags & tears, & sturdy triple-stitching & beltless roomy fit seal the deal

TRUSTED NAME: The world's leading performance workwear brand, Dickies has been making quality workwear & apparel since 1922. All Dickies clothing offers superior craftsmanship & unmatched value to deliver classic style & long-lasting comfort every day.
We make jeans, outerwear, school & work uniforms, sports shirts, kids wear, hats, socks, underwear, boots, gloves, belts, eyewear, backpacks, bags & much more.
description: 12 ounce denim bib overall with a cross-over high back style. Hammer loop and dual tool pocket.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "9 x 5 x 1 inches; 2 Pounds", "Item model number": "KB102", "Department": "boys", "Date First Available": "January 1, 2014", "Manufacturer": "Dickies Children's Apparel"}
